main event: A flying saucer was tracked by MIT radar and observed near Provincetown, Massachusetts on September 21, 1950.
interesting points: The radar detected the object at a speed of over 700 MPH,The object maintained a straight heading without any maneuvers during the observation period,Two F-94 pilots confirmed the presence of the unidentified target,The radar signal from the saucer was at full saturation, which indicates a large object,This sighting is part of the Project Blue Book documentation on UFOs.
witness description: Radar operators and pilots of the F-94 aircraft
